text.name: vca_tip_CAMERAI
text.text: The interior camera rotates automatically according to the steering angle

text.name: vca_tip_CAMERAO
text.text: The exterior camera rotates automatically according to the steering angle

text.name: vca_tip_EXPONENT

text.name: vca_tip_STEERING
text.text: The adaptive steering adjusts the automatic back rotation and the maximum steering angle

text.name: vca_tip_REVERSEI
text.text: If the vehicle changes direction the interior camera is rotated by 180°

text.name: vca_tip_REVERSEO
text.text: If the vehicle changes direction the exterior camera is rotated by 180°

text.name: vca_tip_LIMIT
text.text: Limiter of the throttle without and with left shift key

text.name: vca_tip_PEEKLR

text.name: vca_tip_ANGLE

text.name: vca_tip_BRAKE

text.name: vca_tip_AUTOSHIFT

text.name: vca_tip_KEEPSPEED

text.name: vca_tip_NO_ARB

text.name: vca_tip_HANDTHROTTLE

text.name: vca_tip_SNAP90
text.text: Automatic rotation of lane guidance direction by 90°

text.name: vca_tip_SNAPLEFT

text.name: vca_tip_SNAPRIGHT

text.name: vca_tip_AntiSlip

text.name: vca_tip_DiffManual

text.name: vca_tip_DiffFrontAdv

text.name: vca_tip_HIREDWORKER2

text.name: vca_tip_GEARRGMODE

text.name: vca_tip_IDLETHROTTLE

text.name: vca_tip_MOUSEARB

text.name: vcaHelpIntro_1
text.text: Vehicle Control Addon combines several functions in one modification. Most functions are turned off per default.

text.name: vcaHelpIntro_2
text.text: The standard key combination to open the settings menu is LCtrl C. I propose to check the key binding of Vehicle Control Addon in the game settings menu.

text.name: vcaHelpIntro_3
text.text: The key combination LCtrl LAlt C opens the global settings menu. Here, you can adjust the default settings, which are used in all (future) vehicles.

text.name: vcaHelpCam_1
text.text: Vehicle Control Addon can rotate the camera to match the steering angle and direction. This way you always look into the direction your are driving to.

text.name: vcaHelpCam_2
text.text: You can enable camera rotation in the settings menu. You can choose between values "off", "light", "normal" and "strong". There are separate settings for inside and outside cameras. Additionally, you can turn on/off the automatical reveral of the camera.

text.name: vcaHelpCam_3
text.text: With Shift-right and the cursor keys you can look into the corresponding direction. There are two modes. If peed is on the camera direction is switched back to the previous view as soon as you release the key. If peek is turned off, the the same key change the camera direction without switching back.

text.name: vcaHelpSteering_1
text.text: Vehicle Control Addon varies the steering speed depending on the speed you are driving.

text.name: vcaHelpSteering_2
text.text: The settings menu gives you the opportunity to adjust steeering. If adaptive steering is turned off, then Vehicle Control Addon does not change the steering behaviour. The steering speed settings are only relevant is adaptive steering is on. Free steering completely disables the automatic back rotation.

text.name: vcaHelpSteering_3
text.text: The adaptive steering was designed for keyboard users. The automatic back rotation speed depends on how long you released the A or D keys. This way, you can keep the current rotation of the steering wheel by shortly tapping of either A or D keys. The back rotation to center position is faster if you press the corresponding key. This is like an emergency mode. If you steered too much, then you try to steer into the other direction. This goes much faster but only until the steering wheel reached center position. There is a light version of adaptive steering that reduces the rotation speed only.

text.name: vcaHelpGPS_1
text.text: Vehicle Control Addon includes a simple lane guidance.

text.name: vcaHelpGPS_2
text.text: Lane guidance can only be started if there is a lane width larger than 0.5m. You can detect the current tool width in the settings menu or with the default key binding LCtrl LAlt W. If lane guidance was disabled then you can enable it again on the last lane with default key binding LAlt S. Lane guidance is started with default key binding LCtrl W. It is automatically disabled if you use the steering buttons or wheel.

text.name: vcaHelpGPS_3
text.text: In the vehicle you can move or rotate the guidance lanes with default key bindings LCtrl + cursor key. With default key bindings LAlt A and LAlt D you can switch to the left or right reversal lane. You can specify the number of lanes to switch in the settings menu. If you want to work on the field to the left, than you can specify the left lane numbers one larger than the right lane numbers. With every lane reversal action Vehicle Control Addon swaps the left and right lane numbers.

text.name: vcaHelpThrottle_1
text.text: Vehicle Control Addon offers some small improvements to throttle and braking. Most of them are intended for players using the keyboard.

text.name: vcaHelpThrottle_2
text.text: The throttle limiter values are used with the inching key binding. The 1st value is used without inching, the 2nd value is used when inching is pressed. The lower percentage value applies to cruise control speed if inching is pressed. Low brake force is the brake force the vehicle automatically applies if neither acceleration nor brake pedal are pressed. Reducing the brake force let's the vehicle roll longer without reducing speed.

text.name: vcaHelpThrottle_3
text.text: Shift-Left limits throttle, cruise control and maximum rounds per minute to 75%. If you press delete then the vehicle will keep its speed. Acceleration and brake pedal increase and descrease the speed. The vehicle drives like a modern tractor with joystick. You can toggle automatic shifting with default key binding LCtrl (.

text.name: vcaHelpDiff_1
text.text: If Vehicle Control Addon can identify the differentials, then you have the possibility to operate them manually.

text.name: vcaHelpDiff_2
text.text: Per default Vehicle Control Addon does not change the differentials. When all wheel drive is activated, then the front wheels of standard tractors turn faster than the back wheels. You can enable this with the advance speed settings. In this case Vehicle Control Addon will automatically deactivate all wheel drive above 30 km/h.

text.name: vcaHelpDiff_3
text.text: The default key bindings to operate differentials are LCtrl ), LCtrl ' and LCtrl \.
